climbs.name: Blanket Arete
climbs.fa: p2 cam molder 2002, p1 bernie wiatzka 2003

content.description:
p1, follow bolts up and to the right of the arete in a more sustained climb than originally suspected

p2. ensure you are belaying from the bolts at the right side of the ledge. follow bolt line up and to the left to gain the arete. Make some challenging and exposed clips before gaining easier terrain to the top anchor.



Follow directions for upper blanket. I mini rapped from a tree to the top of the climb. there are two sets of anchors, you want the anchors skiers left. there are two bolts with chains. rap to first of anchors at a nice ledge, and then again to base. There is one bolt facing you on the rock to clip into when you arrive.Â 

all bolts, bolted anchors, 12 draws.
Climbs upstream from the bridge. See map.
